title: [r3912] src/dos/dev_con.h: Use normal teletype function for non-ANSI output so…
message: [r3912] src/dos/dev_con.h: Use normal teletype function for non-ANSI output so the default attribute 7 applies only to graphics modes and existing attributes are not changed in text modes.

title: Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/gururise/dosbox
message: Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/gururise/dosbox

title: [r3910] src/ints/int10_modes.cpp: Correct an oversight in mode table flags,…
message: [r3910] src/ints/int10_modes.cpp: Correct an oversight in mode table flags, which at least fixes aspect correction of mode 6 on VGA machine types. Thanks superfury for noticing.

title: [r3908] src/ints/bios.cpp: Fix compilation on mingw systems.
message: [r3908] src/ints/bios.cpp: Fix compilation on mingw systems.

title: [r3907] src/shell/shell_cmds.cpp: Handle 'copy H*.txt file.txt' correctly
message: [r3907] src/shell/shell_cmds.cpp: Handle 'copy H*.txt file.txt' correctly

title: [r3906] src/dos/drive_fat.cpp: Add support for DOS 1.x floppy images. Also a…
message: [r3906] src/dos/drive_fat.cpp: Add support for DOS 1.x floppy images. Also a small fix to the FAT drive FindNext so it doesn't require a terminating entry in the root directory.

title: [r3905] src/dos/dos_files.cpp: Attempting to unlink (delete) an existing device…
message: [r3905] src/dos/dos_files.cpp: Attempting to unlink (delete) an existing device name returns an access denied error. Fixes EMM device driver detection, and thus SoundBlaster sound, in the Striker soccer game. Also add a log message for FindFirst.

title: [r3904] src/hardware/vga_misc.cpp, src/hardware/vga_other.cpp: Allow CRTC…
message: [r3904] src/hardware/vga_misc.cpp, src/hardware/vga_other.cpp: Allow CRTC read/write access on all mirror ports for non-VGA machine types. Fixes Tandy and EGA display in International Hockey booter. Thanks Great Hierophant for testing on real systems.

title: [r3903] src/hardware/vga_memory.cpp: Amend previous Hercules change so the…
message: [r3903] src/hardware/vga_memory.cpp: Amend previous Hercules change so the MDA-compatible address wrapping is used only when graphics are disabled, but still only in 32kB mode. Thanks TheGreatCodeholio, and thanks Great Hierophant for testing on a real Hercules card.

title: [r3902] src/dos/dos_mscdex.cpp: Amend previous MSCDEX change to use presence of…
message: [r3902] src/dos/dos_mscdex.cpp: Amend previous MSCDEX change to use presence of cdrom device to determine the installed condition, which means unmounting will not revert to the uninstalled condition. Pass unhandled functions back to the multiplex handler, which if nothing else will generate log messages about them being unhandled.

title: Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/gururise/dosbox
message: Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/gururise/dosbox

title: [r3901] src/cpu/lazyflags.h: correct typo in the includeguards
message: [r3901] src/cpu/lazyflags.h: correct typo in the includeguards

title: [r3900] src/hardware/vga_memory.cpp: Map a single 4kB page of video memory that…
message: [r3900] src/hardware/vga_memory.cpp: Map a single 4kB page of video memory that repeats in the 32kB range when in Hercules text mode, making it compatible with MDA. Fixes Future Wars and Operation Stealth install programs on the Hercules machine type.

title: [r3897] src/dos/dos_mscdex.cpp: No response from MSCDEX when it's not…
message: [r3897] src/dos/dos_mscdex.cpp: No response from MSCDEX when it's not installed/active. Allows install programs from the V for Victory series of games to work provided no cdrom drives are mounted.

message: Replaced hard-coded values for LOCAL_PATH inside .mk files; Fixed JNI-build for NDK r10e; Added .gitignore.

title: add file:// to uri to allow OINotepad and other OI editors to work
message: add file:// to uri to allow OINotepad and other OI editors to work

title: [r3896] Do less to update the frequency of an active SB DMA transfer, and…
message: [r3896] Do less to update the frequency of an active SB DMA transfer, and include DSP command 0x41 (fixes SB16 sound in Tempest 2000). Handle DSP command 0x42 as unimplemented, because it is.

title: [r3895] Scan for illegal characters in directory and file names after trimming…
message: [r3895] Scan for illegal characters in directory and file names after trimming to 8.3 rather than before. Fixes Hexx and maybe others that neglect the Z in ASCIIZ.

title: [r3894] Workaround clang confusing itself (compile error), results in a small…
message:
[r3894] Workaround clang confusing itself (compile error), results in a small speed up in general (thanks for helping wjp). clang compiled x64 dynrec core appears to be unstable though. (-O0 seems to help)

 Committer: Gene Ruebsamen <ruebsamen.gene@gmail.com>
